name: Get Balloons into The Mini Jam
name_original: Get Balloons into The Mini Jam
description:
Made for Mini Jam 27, Get Balloons into The Mini Jam is a basic training program for aspiring mages.

In this game, student mages can practice spell control and power judgement by telepathically moving balloons from the start to the end and into the Jammy container. They are only allowed to use the basic force spell however much they want.

In this early testing build, the program restores the student mages mana instantly so that they can cast as much as they want.

Possible future features:

- Possible stages with limited mana

- More dangerous traps to train control and timing

- More complicated levels

- More uses for force push (instead of moving the balloon, force back enemies heading to pop your balloon)
